General.Name: Altus Power Inc
General.Description: Altus Power, Inc., a clean electrification company, develops, constructs, owns, and operates roof, ground, and carport-based photovoltaic solar energy generation and storage systems in the United States. It serves commercial, industrial, public sector, and community solar customers. Altus Power, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut.
General.Address: 2200 Atlantic Street, Stamford, CT, United States, 06902
